alert.note: Alert for Northern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 10:19PM PST until January 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches along the high elevations of highway 3. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Trinity County. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 4 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
